body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Hotel Deluxe's customer support. My name is Bobby Moore. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Diane. Could you please provide me with your email address and phone number for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my email address is diane.ross@example.com and my phone number is five five five, six six six, seven seven seven.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for sharing that information, Diane. Can you also provide me with the check-in date and room number of your current stay at Hotel Deluxe?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Certainly, Bobby. I checked in on the two seven th of March and my room number is two two one.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing those details, Diane. I will make sure to address your room service concerns. Is there anything else you would like to add before we proceed?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, thank you, Bobby. I just feel a bit sad about the service. I appreciate your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand, Diane. Your feedback is valuable to us. Thank you for sharing your experience. If you need any further assistance, feel free to reach out. Have a great day!
